channel.title: [PI]Yell color/Money color/special shops[317]
channel.description:
[center]I have 3 Question
[s][size=18pt]First[/size] can i have yell code for -Yellow -Green -purple -Red -Orange -Pink[/s] [size=18pt]Second[/size] How can i change the ---K and ----M color
[s][u][size=18pt]Third[/size] How can i create a shop which i buy item whit whitout money but whit gold bars.[/center][/u][/s]

item.title: [PI]Yell color/Money color/special shops[317]
item.dc:creator: @Fluoxetine Fluoxetine
item.description:
@Fluoxetine wrote:

[quote=“louisdemon, post:1, topic:411685”][center]I have 3 Question

[size=18pt]First[/size]
can i have yell code for
-Yellow
-Green
-purple
-Red
-Orange
-Pink
[size=18pt]Second[/size]
How can i change the —K and ----M color

[size=18pt]Third[/size]
How can i create a shop which i buy item whit whitout money but whit gold bars.[/center][/quote]

The money colour is definately client sided, i believe its method 14.

And to create a shop that takes white gold bars as currency u would need to follow a tutorial on adding some kind of reward shop like the dungeoneering tokens shop, then change it so it takes white gold bars instead of the tokens if you see what im saying.

Hope i could be of some help

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Yell color/Money color/special shops[317]
item.dc:creator: @fallenlegend fallenlegend
item.description:
@fallenlegend wrote:

For yell colors, go to: http://www.mathsisfun.com/hexadecimal-decimal-colors.html its the decimal spot that shows you the color codes.

For Coin color, I don’t think you can…?

For the Gold bar shop buying thing, I don’t think you’re able to do that either, if possible, then IDK.
